name: Dungeon Defenders 2 Jumpstart Pack
description:
Just starting out in Dungeon Defenders II? Grab this pack to get a kickstart into your adventure!
This pack may only be purchased once per account. To redeem the items contained in the pack, visit and interact with the Mailbox in the Heroes Marketplace or Private Tavern.
This pack contains:
2,000 Gems to purchase Heroes, Flair, Costumes and more. (500 Extra Gems!)
1 Inventory Bag to carry more loot.
1 Bank Vault to store more items in town.
Five Campaign Shard Packs to equip unique bonuses to your heroes and defenses.
